page.title: 13ELPHINSTONE MINER'S CLUB
page.content: THE CLUB WAS OPENED IN 1922.THERE ARE OVER 300 MEMBERS.CLUB MEMBERSHIP IS OPEN TO ANY ONE IN THE VILLAGE.A MEMBER SHIP CARD COSTS 50P.THE CLUB OPENS AT NOON EACH DAY AND CLOSES AT 3 O,CLOCK.IT REOPENS AT SIX AND CLOSES AT MIDNIGHT. THERE ARE MANY DIFFERENT THINGS FOR PEOPLE TO DO. THEY CAN PLAY BINGO. THERE ARE 3 SNOOKER TABLES.PEOPLE LIKE GOING INTO THE CLUB TO WATCH OTHERS PLAYING POOL. THERE ARE LADIES' AND MEN'S DARTS TEAMS.THE CLUB HAS A BOWLING GREEN AND A FISHING CLUB AS WELL AS A LIBRARY.THERE ARE DISCOS AND LADIES NIGHTS.THE CLUB MEMBERS DO ALL THE CATERING THEMSELVES.DURING THE MINERS'STRIKE OF 1984/1985 THE WIVES RAN A SOUP KITCHEN.
